article_title: Dr. Eli Goodman: A prescription for a better health care system

article_metadata.description: Health care belongs in the realm of public service, not the private for-profit sector. It should be a societal obligation to provide good medical care to all, regardless of social or economic circumstances This is the ethical mandate of the medical profession, historically dedicated, as it should be, to the best egalitarian principles. Even the wealthy among us cannot claim to be truly wealthy if our neighbors or their children suffer from lack of access to proper medical care or the
